original_text: They also caught 10,000 soldiers as their prisoners. They took them to the top of a high rock. They threw their prisoners from the top. They all fell down onto the rocks below and they died.
korean_text: 유다 자손이 또 만 명을 사로잡아 가지고 바위 꼭대기에 올라가서 거기서 밀쳐 내려뜨려서 그들의 온 몸이 부서지게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: They also caught 10,000 soldiers as their prisoners.
They took them to the top of a high rock.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들을 높은 바위 꼭대기로 데려갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They threw their prisoners from the top.
They all fell down onto the rocks below
